text: pahuwenida wadata giyama udema api denna manejar gawata giya.apita nidaganna kamarayak nathi withthiyath wahapu kamarayak thiyena wagath api manejar mahaththayata kiwwa.manejar mahaththaya chamariye barakaraya wage inna sumathi ayyawa gennala me gana ahuwa.bankuwe chamariyak wunata api hitiye rent ekata gaththu gedaraka.ithin ee gedara ayithi kenage hithawath mahaththayek me kamare innawa kiyala sumathi kiwwe.me gana manejar mahaththaya kalin danagena idala naha.me inna kena godak welawata sathi anthaye thamayilu enne.gedara pitu passe dore yathurak eyayi gawa thiyena nisa sathi anthe ape aya nathiwelawata awith ee kamare innawa kiyala thamayi sumathi kiwwe.manejar mahaththayata hodatama kenthi gihin sumathitath banala apita kiwwa ee kamare askaragena inna kiyala.
